title: Trump will want circus of NY court appearance as he claims he is the victim
description: In the midst of a comeback, it is quite the comedown.

title: Finland moves closer to becoming NATO member as Turkey ratifies accession
description: Finland has moved a step closer to becoming a NATO member after Turkey's parliament ratified its accession to the alliance.

title: Trump faces criminal charges over alleged hush money payment to adult film actress
description: Donald Trump has been indicted on criminal charges arising from an alleged hush money payment to an adult film actress.

title: King's historic speech to German parliament was serious and personal - with one glaring omission
description: There was huge expectation as the King entered a packed German parliament.

title: Russia wants to trade food for weapons with North Korea, US says
description: Russia is looking to North Korea to source weapons for the war in Ukraine, the US says.

title: Outrage as Spanish actress, 68, has baby via surrogate
description: The revelation that a 68-year-old actress in Spain has given birth via an American surrogate has sparked a political outcry in Madrid.

title: Pope 'improving' after first night in hospital with infection
description: Pope Francis is "progressively improving", the Vatican has said, after he was admitted to hospital with a respiratory infection.

title: US reporter arrested in Russia for alleged spying - first since 1980s
description: A US reporter has been arrested in Russia for allegedly spying for Washington, Russian security services have said.

title: King gets stuck into making cheese on Germany visit - then eats cake shaped like a crown
description: The King took a trip to the German countryside today, where he helped make a special organic cheese to mark his historic visit, as he continued his state visit.

title: King makes history as first British monarch to address German parliament - as he vows to 'renew special bond'
description: The King spoke about politics, history and "renewing the pledge of friendship" as he became the first British monarch to address the German parliament.

title: Bolsonaro arrives back in Brazil with several investigations looming over former president
description: Former president Jair Bolsonaro has arrived back in Brazil where he is facing several investigations - including over his alleged role in encouraging protests that ended with his supporters storming several government buildings.

title: At least 31 dead after passenger ferry fire in Philippines
description: At least 31 people have died after a ferry carrying about 250 passengers and crew caught fire in the southern Philippines.

title: Several feared dead after two US army helicopters crash
description: Several people have reportedly died after two military helicopters crashed in Kentucky.
